issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Write nested types (struct, list)
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10550](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10550). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After being able to compute arbitrarily nested definition and repetitions, we should be able to write structs and lists

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10550?focusedCommentId=17259945) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
Removing fix version since this issue does not appear to be started yet

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10550?focusedCommentId=17332150) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Migrated to github: https://github.com/apache/arrow-rs/issues/124
